options.b: Out-of-memory errors due to high GPU memory requirements

options.b: Hybrid format maintaining FP32's dynamic range with reduced memory

options.b: One quadrillion floating point operations per second for one day
options.a: One billion operations per second for one day

options.d: Equal dataset size and parameter count

options.b: Optimizing model design rather than simply increasing size

options.b: Freezes original parameters and introduces smaller rank decomposition matrices

options.b: Adding trainable tokens (soft prompts) to input

options.b: Prompt tuning automates optimization while engineering is manual

options.a: Reinforcement Learning from Artificial Intelligence Feedback

options.b: Training a smaller student model using a larger teacher model

options.b: Eliminating redundant weights that contribute little to performance

What does RAG stand for?

options.b: Query encoder and external data source

questions.question: In the context of LLMs, what is the primary purpose of a reward model?

options.b: To evaluate outputs and update the LLM's weights for alignment with human preferences

options.c: Choose a model with capabilities relevant to your task
options.d: Convert ranking data to pairwise comparisons

options.b: By ranking the completions based on specific criteria

options.b: To ensure they understand the task and criteria for assessment
options.d: To eliminate the need for quality assurance

options.b: Into pairwise comparisons with assigned scores

options.c: Pairwise comparison data from human labelers

options.b: As a binary classifier to distinguish between positive and negative classes

options.b: A pre-trained model that performs well on the task

questions.question: In the RL process, what does a higher reward value indicate?

options.b: More aligned responses with human preferences

What is the final model called after successful alignment with human values?
What is reward hacking in the context of RLHF?

options.b: When the model learns to maximize rewards in ways that don't align with original objectives

questions.question: What metric is used to measure how much an updated model diverges from a reference model?
What is the purpose of using KL divergence in the reward calculation?

options.b: To penalize excessive divergence from the reference model

options.b: Human evaluation is resource-intensive, requiring large teams

What does Constitutional AI use to guide model behavior?

options.b: A set of rules for self-critique

questions.question: What are the two phases of Constitutional AI training?

options.b: Supervised learning (red teaming) and reinforcement learning from AI feedback (RLAIF)

questions.question: What is model distillation?

options.b: Training a smaller student model using a larger teacher model

options.b: Transforms model weights to lower precision to decrease memory footprint

options.b: Eliminating redundant weights that contribute little to performance

What is the least technical approach to improving model performance?

options.b: They have a knowledge cutoff and outdated information

options.a: They excel at all mathematical operations

options.b: Allows LLMs to access external data sources to overcome knowledge cutoffs

options.b: A query encoder and an external data source

options.b: The reasoning engine generating instructions for the application

options.b: They struggle with complex reasoning tasks involving multiple steps

options.b: Improve LLM reasoning by breaking problems into smaller, human-like steps

options.b: To manage the flow of information between the LLM and interpreter

options.b: Chain of thought reasoning with action planning

options.b: A defined set of allowed actions

options.b: Modular components including prompt templates and tools for external data interaction

options.b: Both predefined chains for common tasks and agents for dynamic decision-making

questions.question: What is the primary goal of RLHF (Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback)?

options.d: To eliminate the need for training data
options.b: To align model outputs with human preferences and values

options.b: The reward value is used to update the LLM's weights through reinforcement learning algorithms

options.b: When the model meets specific evaluation criteria or reaches maximum steps

options.d: It works only with small models
